It is ignored when key\nis set.","name":"pagination.count_total","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}},{"description":"reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.","name":"pagination.reverse","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}

It will be empty if\nthere are no more results.","type":"string","format":"byte"},"total":{"type":"string","format":"uint64","title":"total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total\nwas set, its value is undefined otherwise"}}},"slashes":{"description":"slashes defines the slashes the validator received.","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"ValidatorSlashEvent represents a validator slash event.\nHeight is implicit within the store key.\nThis is needed to calculate appropriate amount of staking tokens\nfor delegations which are withdrawn after a slash has occurred.","properties":{"fraction":{"type":"string"},"validator_period":{"type":"string","format":"uint64"}}}}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
